modName: No Panty Mod for Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M
summary: This mod removes the panty from MAK\'s Remodeled Armors, optional buttocks only or also vanilla. perfect addition to use with my craftable pantys mod
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i183.photobucket.com/albums/x302/gotha83/nexus/nopantymod.png[/img]
Yeaaa, hi, here\'s my second mod :D


[img]http://i183.photobucket.com/albums/x302/gotha83/nexus/description.png[/img]
Many people were asking MAK for a No Panty version, so I put my hands on ;) also came in useful in combination with my other Mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16837]Craftable Panties and Stockings for CBBEv3M[/url] NOW includes an script to dress NPCs randomly with Panties/Stockings too!

[b]- Main File: Romoves the panty of the craftable buttocks armors, the vanilla armors keep the Panty
- Optional File: Removes also the panty of the vanilla replacement armors[/b]


[img]http://i183.photobucket.com/albums/x302/gotha83/nexus/requiredmods.png[/img]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004]Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M[/url]
otherwise you gonna miss boots, gauntlets and some textures 


[img]http://i183.photobucket.com/albums/x302/gotha83/nexus/installation.png[/img]
[b]I recommend to use NMM to install[/b]

1. Be sure you have [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004]Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M[/url] installed
2a. If you use just the main file of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004]Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M[/url] you will need only the main file of my mod
2b. If you also use the optional vanilla replacer file, and want to remove this pantys too, you gonna need my optional file
3. You\'re done!

Endorse if you like it :)


[img]http://i183.photobucket.com/albums/x302/gotha83/nexus/credits.png[/img]
MAK for the Remodeled Armors and the CBBEv3M body :D


[img]http://i183.photobucket.com/albums/x302/gotha83/nexus/myothermods.png[/img]
+ [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16837][b]Craftable Panties and Stockings for CBBEv3M[/b][/url] a perfect addon for this mod


[img]http://i183.photobucket.com/albums/x302/gotha83/nexus/faq.png[/img]
Q: What skin mod are you using?
A: [url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554\"]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible[/url] used this files:
\"CBBE skin texture v1_8 shaved MAIN FILE\" [size=\"3\"][b]+[/b][/size] \"CBBE skin texture v1_8 hairy trimmed body PATCH\" = result on my screens
author: goTha
